title: Senior Software Engineer
company: Keylink Innovative Technology , Hendersonville, United States, Remote
date: Sep 2014 - Oct 2024 | 10 Years 1 Month | Full time job
details:
• Developed and maintained Laravel-based applications, implementing RESTful APIs, authentication systems, and efficient database structures.
  • Optimized application performance using caching strategies and query optimization.
  • Implemented secure medical-related applications, ensuring compliance with industry standards (HIPAA).
  • Developed secure payment solutions and implemented advanced booking logic.
  • Enhanced site performance and improved search functionalities.
  • Partnered with cross-disciplinary teams for seamless application delivery.

title: Lead Software Engineer
company: Louder Design, North Richland Hills, United States, Remote
details:
• Led and managed a team of developers on multiple projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to best coding practices.
  • Developed complex web applications using Laravel, incorporating RESTful APIs, custom middleware, and advanced data handling.
  • Implemented and customized Magento 2 solutions, developing custom extensions, optimizing performance, and integrating third-party services for enhanced eCommerce capabilities.
  • Enhanced WordPress projects by creating custom themes and plugins, ensuring security, responsiveness, and user-focused design.
  • Mentored junior developers and fostered a collaborative team culture, driving project success through effective code reviews and technical guidance.
  • Improved system performance and scalability by adopting efficient coding standards, refactoring legacy codebases, and conducting regular code optimization.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers, to translate business requirements into technical solutions.

title: Associate Software Engineer
company: Meggnotec Technologies Private Limited, Chennai, On-Site
date: Mar 2012 - Aug 2014 | 2 Years 5 Months | Full time job
details:
• Developed and maintained custom Magento 1 eCommerce solutions, including extension integration, custom module creation, and performance optimization.
  • Enhanced WordPress sites by designing custom themes and building/optimizing plugins to extend functionality.
  • Worked closely with design/product teams to implement client requirements and ensure smooth site performance.
  • Conducted site audits to troubleshoot issues and applied security patches to keep platforms up-to-date.
  • Integrated third-party APIs and implemented SEO best practices to improve web traffic and user engagement.
